name: SKTileGroup
desc: A set of tiles that collectively define one type of terrain.

items.name: init(tileDefinition: SKTileDefinition)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a simple tile group with a single tile definition.

items.name: init(rules: [SKTileGroupRule])
items.desc: Creates and initializes a tile group with the specified tile group rules.

items.name: var rules: [SKTileGroupRule]
items.desc: An array of SKTileGroupRule objects that the tile group uses to determine tile placement.

items.name: class func empty() -> Self
items.desc: Creates an empty tile that erases the existing tile at that location on a tile map.
